description: This file defines the BirthdayProvider class, which manages a list of birthdays within a Flutter application. It interacts with a repository to fetch, add, update, and delete birthdays, and also handles scheduling notifications for upcoming birthdays.

classes.name: BirthdayProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages birthday data, interacts with repositories, and schedules notifications for upcoming birthdays.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Initializes the birthday list and sets up subscription for real-time updates.

methods.name: addBirthday
methods.description: Creates a new birthday entry and schedules a notification before the birthday date.
